text:
@HillaryClinton If the issue wasn't that serious one could laugh about the incompetence of the President.
He puts millions of people's lives willingly into jeopardy. An Executive Order on protecting statues and monuments, instead of protecting Americans from Covid19? 🤦‍♂️🤦‍♂️
